description: Police were called to an assault in Canning Town and found a 17-year-old boy with stab injuries.
title: Canning Town: Six people arrested after teen, 17, is stabbed
title_page: Canning Town: Six people arrested after teen, 17, is stabbed - BBC News
maintext:
Six people have been arrested after a 17-year-old was found with stab injuries in east London.
The Metropolitan Police was called to report of an assault on Hallsville Road, near Canning Town station at about 20:30 GMT on Saturday.
The teenager was taken to hospital and remains in a critical but stable condition.
A crime scene is in place and officers remain in the area.
